page.title: 10LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: There is very high unemployment around here, especially in Bacup, where it is over 25% on the Fairview Estate. Once there were busy cotton mills which provided jobs and prosperity for the area, but when the cotton mills closed nothing really took their place.The biggest industry is shoe and slipper manufacture. There is Bacup Shoe Company which is in our D-Block and Hirsts Shoes, which is just outside but many people from Stacksteads have jobs there. Some of the old mills have been converted into small lots which small businesses operate from. The Government are trying to encourage this and our area is an "Enterprise Zone". People get special grants to start up in business and this has helped alot of people who had been made redundant.
